star_methodology: Structured situation-task-action-result stories without STAR-titled chunks.

stories.situation: Need for scalable, configurable UI components slowing feature delivery
stories.task: Create a reuse strategy and component system in React/TypeScript
stories.action: Built context‑aware, prop‑driven components + responsive layout breakpoints (1440/1024/640/360) and automated CI/CD via GitHub + Cloudflare
stories.result: Increased development efficiency ~40% and reduced deployment/update time >15% while boosting engagement ~30% via pyramid navigation personalization

stories.situation: Inconsistent design assets causing iteration delays
stories.task: Unify components into a scalable multi‑platform design system
stories.action: Converted styled React components into Figma design tokens & auto‑layout patterns; rationalized 24 form user flows into 4 layout archetypes
stories.result: Cut design iteration steps >50% and improved productivity ~40%, exceeding sprint completion targets by ≥15%

stories.situation: Need to increase memberships and service registrations
stories.task: Provide contextual customer engagement & resolve onboarding issues
stories.action: Proactively assisted with registration, troubleshooting technical issues, clarifying benefits
stories.result: Raised sales/service registrations ~20% and loyalty retention ~35%

stories.situation: Tool underperforming with design and performance gaps
stories.task: Redesign UI & optimize performance informed by user data
stories.action: Analyzed 1000+ survey responses, ran Hotjar usability reviews, refactored styled components, redesigned key flows
stories.result: Achieved ~900% traffic increase and ~20% server cost reduction via efficiency improvements
